name: Sorb Oiram Repus
description:
It looks like a normal 2D platformer, but appearances are deceptive.

Controls

Move: A / D

Jump: Space

Pause: ESC / P

Sorb Oiram Repus is my entry for the MashUp Game Jam 2. The theme was UNCONVENTIONAL MEANS. This was my third game jam and everything was created within 72 hours.
